覕字的基本解释

覕
piē
古同“瞥”，看一眼：“是以一人之断制利天下，譬之犹一覕也。”

覕
miè
隐蔽而看不见。
寻找。

覕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piē］
［《廣韻》必刃切，去震，幫。］
［《廣韻》莫結切，入屑，明。］
［《集韻》匹蔑切，入屑，滂。］
瞥，看一眼。

覕字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覕； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1134第13
【唐韻】【集韻】?莫結切，音蔑。【玉篇】覓也。　又【說文】蔽不相見也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?必刃切，音?。義同。或作?。　又【集韻】【正韻】?匹蔑切，音撆。過目暫見也。　又割也。【莊子·徐無鬼】是以一人之斷制利天下，譬之猶一覕也。【郭象註】覕，割也。萬物萬形，以一劑割之也。　【集韻】本作瞥。或作?。

覕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覕字的起名意思

暂无。

Nan
Basic explanation of words
Nan
piē
Gu Tong "glanced" and took a look: "The rule of one person is to benefit the world, for example, it's like a glutton."
Nan
miè
Hidden and invisible.
Look for.
Nan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [piē]
["Guang Yun" must be cut, go to shake, help. ]
["Guangyun" Do not cut, enter the crumbs, and illuminate. ]
["Ji Yun" The horse is cut, smashed, and frustrated. ]
Glance, take a look.
Nan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　覕; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1134 No. 13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Do not cut, the sound is contemptuous. [Jade articles] See also.　[Said Wen] You can't meet again.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Must be cut, sound?. The same meaning. Or for?.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? The horse is contemptuous, and the sound is stunned. See you for now.　 Cut again. [Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] It is the rule of one person for the benefit of the world, for example, it is just like a naan. [Guo Xiang's Note] Naan, cut too. Everything is cut with one dose.　【Jiyun】Glimpse of this work. Or for?.
Nan
